data.title: 准备以至少 30 秒的时间回答以下问题
data.subject: Talk about a special toy you had as a child.
data.answer: I have a special toy that is a teddy bear, which is a 6-year-old birthday gift from my mother, and it is my first stuffed toy that I cherish very much. The teddy bear is in the form of a bear, and it is a stuffed toy that is very fluffy when I touch it, which makes me feel very comfortable when I hold it in my arms. The teddy bear has the color of brown, and it is wearing white pajamas. It looks cute that I can't help but hold it in my arms every night when I sleep. I still have this teddy bear now, and it is sitting beside my pillow every day, when I hold it in my arms, it still can remind me of my happy childhood and the comfort it gives me. （138 字）
